messages.content: ComfyUI Fictiverse Nodes are custom nodes for ComfyUI that extend its functionality.
How do you install ComfyUI Fictiverse Nodes?

To install ComfyUI Fictiverse Nodes, first install ComfyUI, then clone the repository in the 'custom_nodes' folder inside your ComfyUI installation or download as zip and unzip the contents to 'custom_nodes/ComfyUI_Fictiverse'. Finally, start or restart ComfyUI.
What does the Color Correction node do?
The Color Correction node tries to match image color from an image reference, although it is noted to be somewhat ineffective and is considered obsolete.
How does the Displace Images with Mask node work?
The Displace Images with Mask node is a modified version of the WAS node that displaces images from a mask with directional amplitudes.
What is the purpose of the Add Noise to Image with Mask node?
The Add Noise to Image with Mask node adds noise to an image inside a given mask.
How does the Displace Image with Depth node function?
The Displace Image with Depth node tries to displace an image based on its depth information.
Are all nodes in ComfyUI Fictiverse still in use?
No, the Color Correction node is marked as obsolete, indicating it may not be in active use or recommended for current projects.
